content:
How does the NUCC codesystem get updated?
https://simplifier.net/packages/fhir.tx.support.r3/0.19.0/files/425265
The canonical URI is http://nucc.org/provider-taxonomy

It does not contain the latest codes from NUCC.
101200000X is an example.
@Sean Mahoney I've been asked in MITRE to get this updated - it's on my agenda for this week (for the update - sometimes it takes a little longer before it actually shows up in tx.fhir.org).
